title: NullPointerException during initial mainnet sync.

labels.name: P4
labels.description: Low (ex: Node doesn't start up when the configuration file has unexpected "end-of-line" character)

body:
### Description

NullPointerException during initial mainnet sync. Sync does continue after it. Besu 20.10.4 on Ubuntu 20.04, using official docker image.

```
eth1_1    | 2021-01-28 13:41:04.192+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-3 | ERROR | Subscribers | Error in callback:
eth1_1    | java.lang.NullPointerException
```

Closing this issue since it did not affect the sync. Let us know if you notice the same problem!ðŸ˜Š
